title: Assassins are going to be so useless
body:
Why make an already weak class even weaker with these broken as fuck ADC items.

Making auto attacks exhaust you is the stupidest shit I've ever seen, AND they turn burst into a DOT which is np because lol muh 50% lifesteal with 80% crit, just right click and tank everyone while critting everyone for 1k dmg.
